CustomField.description: When checked, this context configuration will only execute when there is a specific Salesforce record being discussed in the conversation. When unchecked, it can execute for general conversations without record context.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this if the context configuration needs a specific Salesforce record to work with (e.g., getting Account details requires an Account ID). Leave unchecked for general context that doesn't need a specific record.
CustomField.label: Requires Record Context
